text:
I see... I'll ask the editorial department
about adjusting the content of the article.

...Was it okay with
Chiyuki's choice of where to go?

Maybe, just maybe...
You're hesitating about something?

I...
I don't really have a place I want to go...

...As long as Amana-chan and Tenka-chan are smiling,
I think anywhere we go will be fun.

But, if...
if it's a place just for the two of them, and I---

...It's like,
whether you have a place you want to go or not...
Isn't there something you want to convey?
...With Chiyuki, Amana, and Tenka, it's Alstroemeria.

If there's something you can't convey to Chiyuki,
Amana and Tenka will be affected too.

Producer-san, you might be right...
...I'll try to communicate what's been on my mind.

Hehe, when you put it like that, it sounds so simple---
Even though I'm an adult... I need to be more assertive.

Haha, yeah.
I'm rooting for you---
